ARABIC: يَعْرِفُونَ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرُونَهَا وَأَكْثَرُهُمُ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They acknowledge Allah's blessing and then deny it. Most of them are kuffar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They do know the favours of God, and yet they deny them, for most of them are not grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They are aware of the favours of Allah, and yet refuse to acknowledge them. Most of them are determined not to accept the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They recognize the bounties of God but they refuse them and most of them are unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They recognise the favour* of Allah and then deny it, and most of them are disbelievers. (* Prophet Mohammed (peace and blessings be upon him) and / or all the favours of Allah.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They recognize the grace of Allah, yet they deny it (by worshipping others besides Allah) and most of them are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They recognize the favor of Allah, yet they deny it, and most of them are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They recognize the blessing of God, then they deny it, and the most of them are the unthankful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They know the favour of Allah and then deny it. Most of them are ingrates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They recognize the favour of God, yet they deny it; and most of them are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They recognize the favour of Allah, then they deny it, and most of them are infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They recognize the blessing of Allah and then deny it, and most of them are faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They recognise the favours of Allah; then they deny them; and most of them are (creatures) ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They recognise the Grace of Allah, yet they deny it (by worshipping others besides Allah) and most of them are disbelievers (deny the Prophethood of Muhammad SAW).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They recognize the favors of Allah, then they disbelieve them; most of them are unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They recognize God’s blessing, but then deny it, as most of them are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:83] They recognise God’s grace, that is, they affirm that it comes from Him, and then deny it, by associating others [with Him], and most of them are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: When the Prophet (pbuh) mentioned to them all those blessings, they agreed that all those blessings came from Allah, but then they denied this afterward, and said: no, we have all these blessings through the intercession of our gods. Allah said in response: (They know the favour of Allah) they acknowledge that all these blessings are from Allah (and then deny it) saying: we got them through the intercession of our gods. (Most of them are ingrates) all of them are disbelievers in Allah.
